datasets.name: Exchange Flow Timeline (ETH, 7D, Hourly)
datasets.description: Hourly aggregate ETH flows across labeled exchanges for the last 7 days. Useful for macro exchange accumulation/distribution context.

columns.name: exchange_inflow_eth
columns.description: Total ETH sent into labeled exchange addresses during the hour.

columns.name: exchange_outflow_eth
columns.description: Total ETH sent out from labeled exchange addresses during the hour.

columns.name: net_flow_eth
columns.description: Net flow defined as outflow minus inflow. Positive means net outflow from exchanges.

datasets.name: Per-Exchange Net Flow (ETH, 7D, Hourly)
datasets.description: Hourly ETH inflow/outflow/net flow split by exchange label for the last 7 days. Useful for ranking exchange-specific pressure and rotation.

columns.name: cex_name
columns.description: Exchange label for the matched address cluster.

columns.name: inflow_eth
columns.description: ETH sent into that exchange during the hour.

columns.name: outflow_eth
columns.description: ETH sent out from that exchange during the hour.

columns.name: net_flow_eth
columns.description: Net flow defined as outflow minus inflow for that exchange and hour.

datasets.name: Exchange Interaction Edges (ETH, 24H)
datasets.description: Top 500 ETH transfer edges in the last 24 hours where either source or destination is exchange-labeled. Useful for exchange-centric network graphing.

columns.name: src_label
columns.description: Source label, exchange name when known; otherwise 'unlabeled'.

columns.name: dst_label
columns.description: Destination label, exchange name when known; otherwise 'unlabeled'.

columns.name: total_value_eth
columns.description: Summed ETH value across all transfers for the edge in the 24h window.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: Number of transfers aggregated into the edge.
